channel.title: Php
channel.description:
Uh, is there a way to make it where "$i" equals every skill. Like, there are 25 skills and I want $i to be 1-25. I'm working on this compare function for my new hiscores. My code so far... I'm working on it, so there will be some retarded stuff in here, some parts are from my old hiscores: [code=php]function comparePlayers($name, $name2) { include "mysql.php"; $xptype = findType($type)."xp"; $lvltype = findType($type)."lvl"; $skill = findType($type); $query = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '".fixName($name)."' LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error()); $query2 = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '".fixName($name2)."' LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error()); $UP = getLevelForXP($row["Attackxp"]) > getLevelForXP($row2["Attackxp"]); $row = mysql_fetch_array($query); $overall["lvl"] = getLevelForXP($row["Attackxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Defencexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Strengthxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Constitutionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Rangexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Prayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Magicxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Cookingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Woodcuttingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Fletchingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Fishingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Firemakingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Craftingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Smithingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Miningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Herblorexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Agilityxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Thievingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Slayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Farmingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Runecraftxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Conqueringxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Constructionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Summoningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row["Hunterxp"]); $overall["xp"] = $row["Attackxp"] + $row["Defencexp"] + $row["Strengthxp"] + $row["Constitutionxp"] + $row["Rangexp"] + $row["Prayerxp"] + $row["Magicxp"] + $row["Cookingxp"] + $row["Woodcuttingxp"] + $row["Fletchingxp"] + $row["Fishingxp"] + $row["Firemakingxp"] + $row["Craftingxp"] + $row["Smithingxp"] + $row["Miningxp"] + $row["Herblorexp"] + $row["Agilityxp"] + $row["Thievingxp"] + $row["Slayerxp"] + $row["Farmingxp"] + $row["Runecraftxp"] + $row["Conqueringxp"] + $row["Constructionxp"] + $row["Summoningxp"] + $row["Hunterxp"]; $row2 = mysql_fetch_array($query2); $overall["lvls"] = getLevelForXP($row2["Attackxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Defencexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Strengthxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Constitutionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Rangexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Prayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Magicxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Cookingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Woodcuttingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Fletchingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Fishingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Firemakingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Craftingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Smithingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Miningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Herblorexp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Agilityxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Thievingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Slayerxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Farmingxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Runecraftxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Conqueringxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Constructionxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Summoningxp"]) + getLevelForXP($row2["Hunterxp"]); $overall["xps"] = $row2["Attackxp"] + $row2["Defencexp"] + $row2["Strengthxp"] + $row2["Constitutionxp"] + $row2["Rangexp"] + $row2["Prayerxp"] + $row2["Magicxp"] + $row2["Cookingxp"] + $row2["Woodcuttingxp"] + $row2["Fletchingxp"] + $row2["Fishingxp"] + $row2["Firemakingxp"] + $row2["Craftingxp"] + $row2["Smithingxp"] + $row2["Miningxp"] + $row2["Herblorexp"] + $row2["Agilityxp"] + $row2["Thievingxp"] + $row2["Slayerxp"] + $row2["Farmingxp"] + $row2["Runecraftxp"] + $row2["Conqueringxp"] + $row2["Constructionxp"] + $row2["Summoningxp"] + $row2["Hunterxp"]; $i=1 echo' '; echo '
Overall '.findRank($_GET["user"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvl"]).' '.dots($overall["xp"]).' ';if(($overall["lvl"]) > ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) < ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo ' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvls"]).' '.dots($overall["xps"]).' ';if(($overall["lvls"]) > ($overall["lvl"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvls"]) < ($overall["lvl"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo ' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvls"]).' '.dots($overall["xps"]).' '; if(($overall["lvl"]) > ($overall["lvls"])){ echo'
';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) < ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo ' ';} echo'
Attack '.findRank($_GET["user"],"1").' '.getLevelForXP($row["Attackxp"]).' '.dots($row["Attackxp"]).' ';if(($row["Attackxp"]) > ($row2["Attackxp"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row["Attackxp"]) < ($row2["Attackxp"])){ echo' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"1").' '.getLevelForXP($row2["Attackxp"]).' '.dots($row2["Attackxp"]).' ';if(($row2["Attackxp"]) > ($row["Attackxp"])){ echo'
';} else if(($row2["Attackxp"]) < ($row["Attackxp"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row2["Attackxp"]) == ($row["Attackxp"])){ echo' ';} echo'
Defence '.findRank($_GET["user"],"2").' '.getLevelForXP($row["Defencexp"]).' '.dots($row["Defencexp"]).' ';if(($row["Defencexp"]) > ($row2["Defencexp"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row["Defencexp"]) < ($row2["Defencexp"])){ echo' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"2").' '.getLevelForXP($row2["Defencexp"]).' '.dots($row2["Defencexp"]).' ';if(($row2["Defencexp"]) > ($row["Defencexp"])){ echo'
';} else if(($row2["Defencexp"]) < ($row["Defencexp"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row2["Defencexp"]) == ($row["Defencexp"])){ echo' ';}echo'
'.$skill.' '.findRank($_GET["user"],".$i.").' '.getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"]).' '.dots($row["$xptype"]).' ';if(($row["$xptype"]) > ($row2["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row["$xptype"]) < ($row2["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],".$i.").' '.getLevelForXP($row2["$xptype"]).' '.dots($row2["$xptype"]).' ';if(($row2["$xptype"]) > ($row["$xptype"])){ echo'
';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) < ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) == ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} }[/code] [b]EDIT:[/b]Managed to shorten that down: [code=php]for ($i = 1; $i <=25; $i++){ $xptype = findType($i)."xp"; echo'
'.findType($i).' '.findRank($_GET["user"],"$i").' '.getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i").' '.dots($row["$xptype"],"$i").' ';if(($row["$xptype"]) > ($row2["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row["$xptype"]) < ($row2["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) == ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"$i").' '.getLevelForXP($row2["$xptype"]).' '.dots($row2["$xptype"]).' ';if(($row2["$xptype"]) > ($row["$xptype"])){ echo'
';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) < ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) == ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' ';}}[/code]

item.title: Php
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:1, topic:395927”][quote author=sageofmali link=topic=492976.msg3604791#msg3604791 date=1306004073]Nvm, I got it. I didn’t feel like waiting, so I did each by hand(Didn’t take long).
http://sagescape.zapto.org/hiscores/compare.php?user=Hainoob&user2=Piron
[/quote]
It takes like 10 seconds for the page to load because it’s so inefficient.[/quote]
I know, that’s why I needed help. Here’s my compare.php and functions: http://pastebin.com/YdGyFBZ7
I shortened it down to two: [code=php]function comparePlayers($name, $name2) {
include “mysql.php”;
//$xptype = findType($i).“xp”;
$lvltype = findType($type).“lvl”;
$skill = findType($type);
$query = mysql_query(“SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '”.fixName($name)."’ LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error());
$query2 = mysql_query(“SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '”.fixName($name2)."’ LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error());
$row = mysql_fetch_array($query);
$overall[“lvl”] = getLevelForXP($row[“Attackxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Defencexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Strengthxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Constitutionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Rangexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Prayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Magicxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Cookingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Woodcuttingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Fletchingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Fishingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Firemakingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Craftingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Smithingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Miningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Herblorexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Agilityxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Thievingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Slayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Farmingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Runecraftxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Conqueringxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Constructionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Summoningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Hunterxp”]);
$overall[“xp”] = $row[“Attackxp”] + $row[“Defencexp”] + $row[“Strengthxp”] + $row[“Constitutionxp”] + $row[“Rangexp”] + $row[“Prayerxp”] + $row[“Magicxp”] + $row[“Cookingxp”] + $row[“Woodcuttingxp”] + $row[“Fletchingxp”] + $row[“Fishingxp”] + $row[“Firemakingxp”] + $row[“Craftingxp”] + $row[“Smithingxp”] + $row[“Miningxp”] + $row[“Herblorexp”] + $row[“Agilityxp”] + $row[“Thievingxp”] + $row[“Slayerxp”] + $row[“Farmingxp”] + $row[“Runecraftxp”] + $row[“Conqueringxp”] + $row[“Constructionxp”] + $row[“Summoningxp”] + $row[“Hunterxp”];
$row2 = mysql_fetch_array($query2);
$overall[“lvls”] = getLevelForXP($row2[“Attackxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Defencexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Strengthxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Constitutionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Rangexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Prayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Magicxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Cookingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Woodcuttingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Fletchingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Fishingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Firemakingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Craftingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Smithingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Miningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Herblorexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Agilityxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Thievingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Slayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Farmingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Runecraftxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Conqueringxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Constructionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Summoningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Hunterxp”]);
$overall[“xps”] = $row2[“Attackxp”] + $row2[“Defencexp”] + $row2[“Strengthxp”] + $row2[“Constitutionxp”] + $row2[“Rangexp”] + $row2[“Prayerxp”] + $row2[“Magicxp”] + $row2[“Cookingxp”] + $row2[“Woodcuttingxp”] + $row2[“Fletchingxp”] + $row2[“Fishingxp”] + $row2[“Firemakingxp”] + $row2[“Craftingxp”] + $row2[“Smithingxp”] + $row2[“Miningxp”] + $row2[“Herblorexp”] + $row2[“Agilityxp”] + $row2[“Thievingxp”] + $row2[“Slayerxp”] + $row2[“Farmingxp”] + $row2[“Runecraftxp”] + $row2[“Conqueringxp”] + $row2[“Constructionxp”] + $row2[“Summoningxp”] + $row2[“Hunterxp”];
echo’ '; //overall echo '

Overall '.findRank($_GET["user"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvl"]).' '.dots($overall["xp"]).' ';if(($overall["lvl"]) > ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) < ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo '

';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) < ($overall["xps"])){ echo '

';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvls"]).' '.dots($overall["xps"]).' ';if(($overall["lvls"]) > ($overall["lvl"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvls"]) < ($overall["lvl"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvls"]) == ($overall["lvl"]) && ($overall["xps"]) > ($overall["xp"])){ echo '

';} else if(($overall["lvls"]) == ($overall["lvl"]) && ($overall["xps"]) < ($overall["xp"])){ echo '

';}

echo’
<a class=“playerValueRightColumn” href=“overall.php?user=’.$_GET[“user2”].’”>

‘.findRank($_GET[“user2”],“0”).’


‘.dots($overall[“lvls”]).’


‘.dots($overall[“xps”]).’


‘;
if(($overall[“lvl”]) > ($overall[“lvls”])){
echo’



';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) < ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo ' ';} //Test for ($i = 1; $i <=25; $i++){ $xptype = findType($i)."xp"; echo'
'.findType($i).' '.findRank($_GET["user"],"$i").' '.getLevelForXP($row["$xptype"],"$i").' '.dots($row["$xptype"],"$i").' ';if(($row["$xptype"]) > ($row2["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row["$xptype"]) < ($row2["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) == ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"$i").' '.getLevelForXP($row2["$xptype"]).' '.dots($row2["$xptype"]).' ';if(($row2["$xptype"]) > ($row["$xptype"])){ echo'
';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) < ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row2["$xptype"]) == ($row["$xptype"])){ echo' ';}} }[/code]

item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

cedaw:

it’s not ideal to echo entire pages. try to create a basic layout that you can just inject the data from the sql queries.

I’m not echoing the whole page… It’s just a table. And, what I’m doing is at Http://sagescape.zapto.org/hiscores/compare.php
I’m making so I don’t have to make a whole freaking thing for every skill.

item.title: Php
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Uh, is there a way to make it where “$i” equals every skill. Like, there are 25 skills and I want $i to be 1-25. I’m working on this compare function for my new hiscores.
My code so far… I’m working on it, so there will be some retarded stuff in here, some parts are from my old hiscores: [code=php]function comparePlayers($name, $name2) {
include “mysql.php”;
$xptype = findType($type).“xp”;
$lvltype = findType($type).“lvl”;
$skill = findType($type);
$query = mysql_query(“SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '”.fixName($name)."’ LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error());
$query2 = mysql_query(“SELECT * FROM skills WHERE playerName LIKE '”.fixName($name2)."’ LIMIT 1") or die(mysql_error());
$UP = getLevelForXP($row[“Attackxp”]) > getLevelForXP($row2[“Attackxp”]);
$row = mysql_fetch_array($query);
$overall[“lvl”] = getLevelForXP($row[“Attackxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Defencexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Strengthxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Constitutionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Rangexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Prayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Magicxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Cookingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Woodcuttingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Fletchingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Fishingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Firemakingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Craftingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Smithingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Miningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Herblorexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Agilityxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Thievingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Slayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Farmingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Runecraftxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Conqueringxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Constructionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Summoningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row[“Hunterxp”]);
$overall[“xp”] = $row[“Attackxp”] + $row[“Defencexp”] + $row[“Strengthxp”] + $row[“Constitutionxp”] + $row[“Rangexp”] + $row[“Prayerxp”] + $row[“Magicxp”] + $row[“Cookingxp”] + $row[“Woodcuttingxp”] + $row[“Fletchingxp”] + $row[“Fishingxp”] + $row[“Firemakingxp”] + $row[“Craftingxp”] + $row[“Smithingxp”] + $row[“Miningxp”] + $row[“Herblorexp”] + $row[“Agilityxp”] + $row[“Thievingxp”] + $row[“Slayerxp”] + $row[“Farmingxp”] + $row[“Runecraftxp”] + $row[“Conqueringxp”] + $row[“Constructionxp”] + $row[“Summoningxp”] + $row[“Hunterxp”];
$row2 = mysql_fetch_array($query2);
$overall[“lvls”] = getLevelForXP($row2[“Attackxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Defencexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Strengthxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Constitutionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Rangexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Prayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Magicxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Cookingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Woodcuttingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Fletchingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Fishingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Firemakingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Craftingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Smithingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Miningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Herblorexp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Agilityxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Thievingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Slayerxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Farmingxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Runecraftxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Conqueringxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Constructionxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Summoningxp”]) + getLevelForXP($row2[“Hunterxp”]);
$overall[“xps”] = $row2[“Attackxp”] + $row2[“Defencexp”] + $row2[“Strengthxp”] + $row2[“Constitutionxp”] + $row2[“Rangexp”] + $row2[“Prayerxp”] + $row2[“Magicxp”] + $row2[“Cookingxp”] + $row2[“Woodcuttingxp”] + $row2[“Fletchingxp”] + $row2[“Fishingxp”] + $row2[“Firemakingxp”] + $row2[“Craftingxp”] + $row2[“Smithingxp”] + $row2[“Miningxp”] + $row2[“Herblorexp”] + $row2[“Agilityxp”] + $row2[“Thievingxp”] + $row2[“Slayerxp”] + $row2[“Farmingxp”] + $row2[“Runecraftxp”] + $row2[“Conqueringxp”] + $row2[“Constructionxp”] + $row2[“Summoningxp”] + $row2[“Hunterxp”];
$i=1
echo’ '; echo '

Overall '.findRank($_GET["user"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvl"]).' '.dots($overall["xp"]).' ';if(($overall["lvl"]) > ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) < ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo '

';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"0").' '.dots($overall["lvls"]).' '.dots($overall["xps"]).' ';if(($overall["lvls"]) > ($overall["lvl"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvls"]) < ($overall["lvl"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo '

';}

echo’
<a class=“playerValueRightColumn” href=“overall.php?user=’.$_GET[“user2”].’”>

‘.findRank($_GET[“user2”],“0”).’


‘.dots($overall[“lvls”]).’


‘.dots($overall[“xps”]).’


‘;
if(($overall[“lvl”]) > ($overall[“lvls”])){
echo’



';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) < ($overall["lvls"])){ echo' ';} else if(($overall["lvl"]) == ($overall["lvls"]) && ($overall["xp"]) > ($overall["xps"])){ echo ' ';} echo'
Attack '.findRank($_GET["user"],"1").' '.getLevelForXP($row["Attackxp"]).' '.dots($row["Attackxp"]).' ';if(($row["Attackxp"]) > ($row2["Attackxp"])){ echo' ';} else if(($row["Attackxp"]) < ($row2["Attackxp"])){ echo' ';} echo' '.findRank($_GET["user2"],"1").' '.getLevelForXP($row2["Attackxp"]).' '.dots($row2["Attackxp"]).' ';if(($row2["Attackxp"]) > ($row["Attackxp"])){ echo'
